description: Stylish 2 Bedroom Apartment With Great Transportation LinkLon-242033Homelike is an online booking platform for furnished apartments for short to long stays. All bills and utilities are included in the monthly price Viewings are not available for most properties as our booking process is 100% online. When inquiring about a property, please quote the property reference number above.Stunning river-view apartment in a centrally located home in the central Zone 2 London. This stylish apartment offers easy access to some of London's most well-known locations, as Canning Town Jubilee Line tube & DLR station (Zone 2) is only a 5 minutes’ walk away, which will give you easy access to Excel, Canary Wharf, The City, Central London and beyond. This stylish place to stay is perfect for families, groups of friends or colleagues to exploring London or come for a short business trip.Notice: Displayed prices and data are not final, and should be used for informative purpose only. They are not contractual or binding.Energy passThis building is not subject to EnEV.Tenants use our platform to avoid apartment viewing queues and to book desired flat within minutes. After you request more details, we will send you booking instructions by email.AreaWelcome to our luxurious stylish apartment which enjoys its own private entrance. Step into a haven of luxury, as this meticulously designed space features high-end furnishings, fixtures, and fittings throughout.The open-plan kitchen boasts modern appliances, ensuring that you have everything you need to whip up a delectable meal. We also provide expresso coffee machine and capsules as a complimentary offering.The apartment features two well-appointed bedrooms, each offering a comfortable and inviting atmosphere. The ensuite master bedroom and Bedroom 2 on the first floor feature floor-to-ceiling river-facing windows and king size beds, while downstairs the living room also offers a small double sofa bed. All bedrooms are bright and airy, equipped with ample storage space, and adorned with fresh hotel-quality linen for your utmost comfort.Refresh and rejuvenate in the well-appointed bathrooms, where you can indulge in a relaxing soak in the bathtub or invigorate yourself with an energizing shower to start your day off right.We strive to provide a luxurious and comfortable experience for our guests, and our apartment offers a haven of relaxation and refinement. Book now and treat yourself to an unforgettable stay in this exceptional space.

key_features: ['Furnished or unfurnished', 'Car port', 'Close to the train station', 'Dishwasher', 'Double Glazing', 'Downstairs WC', 'End of Terrace', 'Fitted Bathroom', 'Fitted Kitchen', 'Gas Central Heating', 'Integrated Appliances', 'Modern Condition']
description: DescriptionWelcome to Your Perfect Home!Discover the epitome of modern living in this meticulously maintained two-bedroom mid-terraced home, nestled in the prestigious Crest Nicholson site in Finberry, Ashford. From the moment you step inside, you'll be amazed by the impeccable condition of this residence, which looks as pristine as the day it was built.End-of-Terrace Luxury: This particular home enjoys the coveted status of being an end-of-terrace property, offering added privacy and convenience. It's thoughtfully attached to carports next door, granting you direct access from your garden and the added convenience of an outdoor power point.Enchanting Garden: Step into the garden, a serene oasis with a perfect blend of lush green lawns and inviting paved areas. It also features a generously-sized, secure, and robust shed, providing ample storage space for your needs.Chic and Practical: The downstairs area features solid flooring, not only lending a sleek and contemporary feel but also making maintenance a breeze. The spacious lounge/dining area is a blank canvas for you to customize according to your lifestyle needs, boasting neutral décor and stylish Venetian blinds. A convenient downstairs WC adds to the practicality, leading you to a beautifully designed kitchen that showcases integrated appliances and an abundance of kitchen units. The kitchen dining area is a high-spec haven, offering both class and ample space for a dining table or breakfast bar.Upstairs Comfort: Ascend the stairs to find two generously-sized double bedrooms, adorned with the same neutral theme and featuring modern carpets and pre-fitted Venetian blinds. Wardrobe space in both bedrooms ensures your storage needs are met. Nestled between these bedrooms is a family bathroom that remains immaculate and exudes a show-home style.Don't miss the opportunity to make this immaculate and stylish home your own. Contact us today to arrange a viewing and start living in the lap of modern luxury.*please note: Due to the overwhelming volume of enquiries on each property we advertise it will take time to come back to everyone.Council Tax Band: C (Ashford )Deposit: £1,500Holding Deposit: £300Living Room (3.96m x 3.96m)WC (1.83m x 0.91m)DownstairsKitchen/Diner (3.96m x 3.05m)Garden (9.14m x 3.96m)Bedroom 1 (3.96m x 3.05m)Bedroom 2 (3.96m x 3.05m)Bathroom (2.44m x 2.44m)
